ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H & WD1 resolution
New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
New GUI; HDMI output for better resolution
Multiple operation modes (Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance and Mobile monitoring)
USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H Realtime Network DVR with HDMI & VGA for Security Camera System - 960×480 & 30FPS Recording, 11fps WD1 Playback speed. iPhone, Android Viewing (No Hard Drive Installed)
